name: Jack Nicklaus presents The Major Championship Courses of 1989
description:
This is a golf course add-on for use with either Jack Nicklaus' Greatest 18 Holes of Major Championship Golf or Jack Nicklaus' Unlimited Golf & Course Design. It contains the following courses:
  1. Oak Hill Country Club (U.S. Open Championship)
  2. Royal Troon Golf Club (British Open Championship)
  3. Kemper Lakes Golf Club (PGA Championship)
alsoFor: Apple IIgs, Commodore 64, DOS, Macintosh, Sharp X68000 | Combined View
